Zaten daha önceki oyunlarda Dünyası efsaneydi, gene muhteşem bir iş başarmışlar. Hikayesi ciddi anlamda muhteşemdi diyebilirim, bittikten sonra bir süre kendime gelemedim, internette yorumlara bakmak oldu ilk işim. Yine bir şaheseri çok geç oynamış olmanın pişmanlığını yaşasam da, siz de mahrum kalmayın, tüm seriyi mutlaka alın ve oynayın. Yetmezse kitabını da almanız tavsiyemdir, çok daha açıklayıcı oluyor..

Ayrıca bir dipnot, Elizabeth'e bağlanmanız garanti, bi karakter kendini ancak bu kadar sevdirebilir :D

I loved the story. Even it confused my mind, than had a look at some theories. The game has more undiscovered,but the thing that made made me dislike was, monotonious gameplay. I got bored doing the same, shooting taking a cover. Story nice gameplay sux. Mechanics and visuals are good though You have fun in the end but a long way to go do the same.

Edit: Recalco lo que dije hace mucho tiempo, este juego es un clasico, sino lo tienes en tu biblioteca, tienes que tenerlo, un gran juego con una tremenda historia y por supuesto, las expansiones Bureau At Sea cierran con broche de oro toda esta grandiosa Saga, no dejan cabos sueltos y cabe resaltar ademas el gran apartado grafico y los personajes, estan muy bien realizados, recomendado, la saga Bioshock de por si ya es leyenda :D

Bioshock Infinite is a great game. It does NOT take place in the previous setting of Bioshock games. I highly recommend this game for Bioshock fans. The colors and beautiful design of the game alone is a great reaosn to try it out.

愛的理直氣壯獎 就給他惹
我要去巴黎

Sinceramente não tem como não fala bem de uma obra prima como essa, a história é cativante, gráficos muito bonitos e a diversão é garantida, o melhor de tudo o Jogo é viciante, a meu ver, este foi o melhor da série.

This game was a moderate FPS at best.

I loved the first two Bioshock games, played them when they first came out and thought they were fantastic.  I picked up this game shortly after release, played it for a couple hours, thought 'this is trash' and didn't come back for four years.  Enter 2017 I decide out of spite to play the game due to its ratings and my fond memories of the first two.  It still took me several attempts to get more than just a couple hours in, but I was determined to finish it. 

The plot seems more like an excuse to shoot at and destroy imagery of our founding fathers and historical culture of the US.  The gunplay is redundant, the levels too small and repetitive, and the vigors forgetable.  You find yourself running through the same level multiple times, back and forth, Including how many times I tried to start the game, I must have climbed that light hosue a couple dozen times.

The ending too, for the last half of the game I was just waiting for it to be over.  Then just when you think you're finally done, it drags on for a few more hours, only to drag on for another hour attempting to tie metaphysics into the game to make brainlets feel special.  It doesn't work, it's objectively a convoluted mess of a story, like the devs couldn't decide what plot to pick, so they just mushed all the concepts together into one disaster.

TL;DR - 3/10, don't waste your time.
i74770k+16GB+GTX1080TI 竟然一卡一卡的，重启下又流畅很多，别的游戏不会出现这种情况。
这个游戏不说多好玩，但是里面的队友伊丽莎白绝对是最好的人工智能队友。首先不会傻bb的妨碍你开枪，她会自己找掩体蹲下，当你子弹和血量不足时他会给你给你足够的装备，他还会根据场景的变换有不同的表情和心情。单凭这点足以改变我对这游戏的看法，虽然之后结局goodend，但也是好游戏所以我极力推荐
看风景都能回本了
谁敢反对伊丽莎白 我就打爆他狗头

至今为止玩过表现力最强的游戏

药！！！！一颗好药啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！！

宗教元素让这个游戏充满神秘的美感

我爱它 虽然我真的是fps废物

什么样的游戏可以被称之为艺术？生化奇兵无限便是可当之无愧称之为第九艺术的游戏。艺术不仅是美好的，他可以是残酷的，血腥的，游戏中充满着各色暴力恐怖，但也无妨他艺术品的地位。
       系列一二三代都建立在无比美好的乌托邦之上，从海底城到天空城，场景的塑造无可比拟，进入游戏看到那天空中的哥伦比亚，我当时：wow！觉得什么词都无法形容。游戏中各色场景天气的变换严格切合着游戏氛围，场景变换的迅速所带来的落差与不协调感也更能给我带来更多的好奇。可以说，制作组真真切切的创造一个耸立于云端上的天空之城。
       相比于前几作，本作节奏更加快，也不是那么沉闷，喜欢突突突的玩家也可以很好的找到感觉，我觉得前作很蛋疼的弹药问题在这一作完全没有一点感觉，上好弹药，异能轰炸去拯救你的[spoiler]女儿[/spoiler]吧！
       本作的剧情很晦涩，要结合各种录音跟场景语言的暗示来理解，不过可能是我很懒，没有一个个看完，到达结局，看到主角的遭遇后也是懵懵懂懂，最后也是看的评测里的完整剧情解析23333。然后，amazing！哇哇哇，突然贯通了。很有意思。
       但是最令我惊喜的还是关于伊丽莎白这个人物的塑造，从一开始一个天真无邪的女孩（?）,从第一次看到布克杀人对布克产生的厌恶，天真的阶段，到自己为拯救他人而亲手杀人，成熟阶段，到最后洞晓一切，理性阶段。从人物的神情语言至动作，我觉得是一个足以媲美《最后生还者》艾莉的存在。评测的朋友们一个个喊着女儿老婆不是最有力的证明吗（滑稽）。
       此作品推荐给所有成年玩家。
Fun game play, amazing story
PERFECCIÓN

This is a rollercoaster of a game, story that is rich, gameplay that has the Bioshock signature, and a setting just as bizzare as the first game. The game has been out for quite a while, and I personally love to replay the game just for the action and the atmosphere. 

I reccomend this game for all the players that want the unique fps gameplay of Bioshock and the Dishonored series, and love the dark mood and gore of this story driven game.

I have just finished this game and WOW! My heart aches and feels a little empty.  This game is really something. I would highly recommend people who like rich plot games to play this. This game offers strong character development which made me love them. The voice acting is fantastic! It brings up tthe tension and emotions of the characters which greatly impacts the game. Apart from the beautiful scenery, this game will blow your mind when it starts to unravel. Although I kind of dislike the ending of Bioshock Infinite, I find this game entertaining and addictive. I would also highly recommend people to buy the sequels (Both episodes of Burial At Sea).
游戏倒是不错，高画质有点带带不动，但是最要命的是游戏会莫名其妙的有噪音，还是为是电脑喇叭的问题，带上耳机之后直接要聋了。还有每次退回到桌面的时候都会无法退出，只能重启、
剧情超赞！！

作为划时代叙事类游戏的鼻祖，BIOSHOCK系列再一次创造了一个传奇。

优秀的射击和施法手感以及可以说是神剧情的游戏体验极其激动人心，补票前我已经通关了三周目。

最出彩的自然是可爱的伊丽莎白，制作组在这个举足轻重的角色身上花费了大量心血，不仅是配音和动作，单是让她自然的跟着主角跑来跑去，且随时和周围互动就非常耗费时间精力，从最终效果来看这依旧是目前所有游戏里最出色的陪伴角色，从各种方面来看，伊丽莎白都是最优秀的。

我难以用语言形容自己对这个游戏的喜爱，它已经超过了游戏本身。

如还不入手，你会错过一段奇妙，有趣，黑暗而又无奈的旅程。
不错的剧情  伊丽莎白让我在单机游戏中找到了与妹子双排的感觉

Very few games can tell a great story, and Bioshock Infinite does it beautifully. All the characters are likable in the roles the play and the aesthetics still hold up by today's standards. You won't be disappointed by the ending either.

总体觉是一款很值得一玩的游戏

画面精致，游戏中的操作不是很困难，对手残玩家很有善，剧情很有意思，打击感和
手感在
fps中算是比较好的，唯一有遗憾的是难度有点低
，但游戏的画面和各种在战斗中的其他要素很好的增加了游戏的趣味性，收集要素也能帮助更好地理解游戏的剧情，总之这款游戏不容错过。

I know it's been said a thousand times but the save system in the game makes it unplayable for me. If you have no problem with possibly losing hours of progress every time you play a game then you'll love the game. If it wasn't for the save system I'd give the game a 9/10 but due to it's save system I give it a 2/10. Jeez they could have at least added manual saving as an optional download or something. Sad that they ruined a game with truly amazing potential over something as stupid as how the game saves.

Garbage. Only good thing is the visuals. Very obvious of the agenda and propaganda it tries to push. Nothing like the first 2. Also, the only real fun one was the first game, because of the whole steam punk and 40s era with art deco stuff was a unique experience for me at the time. The first game was a new world that pulled you in and i was a sucker for the art deco stuff. I love that aesthetic. I love the concept of the new floating world, but they took a bad direction with it. Story ruins the nice visuals.

Bioshock infinitie: единственная в своем роде игра, одна из немногих, которую ты обязан пройти!
Графика: для своего времени шикарна,10/10

Сюжет: не так прост как кажется на первый взгляд, особенно концовка. 10/10

Bioshock: Infinite is a masterpiece. I can talk so much about this game. I love it to bits.

A game that completely throws you into a different world. Retro-sci-fi-ish. It's setting in the year of the early 1900s is heavy, almost feels like you are in it itself. The atmosphere it presents, its music, it draws you in very well. It's Christian-based cult is heavy, and drags the shivers down my spine when I played it. I loved the theme, the atmosphere, the setting, and everything that this game made me felt while I was playing it.

The characters really deliver an emotional impact, and the game does it really well at making you feel attached to the characters in the game. Elizabeth was a real sweetheart.

The story ? Brilliant. I really loved it. A twist nobody would see coming at all. The developers had to be beyond high to figure out something this amazing.

I got into a post-game depression after this game. I was glad that I played this game, but really made me sad that it had to end such an amazing journey. Without a doubt, this game goes on the top of my list of the best game. I don't think any other game would make me feel this engulfed in its entire game for a good couple of years.

I don't have a scale for this. 15/10 isn't even enough to describe it.
Отличный шутер со стилистикой 30х перенесённая в будущее, интересный сюжет, красивая картинка, диалоги, миссии . Наиграл так мало потому что ещё 4 года назад прошёл её на playstation 3 ;))

Before I begin my review I will say that I've never played a Bioshock game before, this is my first one. From what I've played, I've really enjoyed this game. The graphics look very good even though this game came out a few years ago, the only thing that I can say I "dislike" about the graphics and this is really minor is that sometimes the game studders even with my 1060. Its a little annoying, but its nothing that will ruin the game whatsoever. I also enjoy the story, Booker is a great main character and Elizabeth is also really nice. She'll help you thoughout the game. Now I'm going to finish my review here as I don't want to spoil anything, but I will say that if you want an enjoyable game for a good price, pick up Bioshock Infinte.

Best escort quest  game I've played; didn't need protecting or baby sitting, was always helpful and never annoying.

That said I do think it's a bit overrated but it is pretty good and solid. There really isn't anything for me to say that isn't already covered in other reviews.


HOWEVER

Screw that FPS stutter, man. I have a pretty dang good rig but at moments the FPS would chug and stutter like I was running Fallout 3 on my old toaster.

Beyond that, got in on sale for cheap, and overall enjoyed it. The story prrrobably won't be for everyone, and might be predictable for some, but I got more than what I paid for.

Pretty good.

一周目玩到结局的时候好像出Bug了...角色没回头，更别说伊丽莎白们有没有出现了，就直接没入水中然后黑屏字幕了，一脸懵逼啊。在B站看人家结尾不是这样的啊，读档再来，就正常了…回头，女儿们出现，被按进水里。
再回想那个出Bug的结局，就跟接受洗礼要变成康斯托克了一样…真的懵逼…

一方の映画のようなストーリー、「バイオショックインフィニット」

バイオショックインフィニットは、その独特の世界観を認められ、本としても出版された。それほど世界観の完成度やストーリーの面白さがゲームプレイに大きな刺激を与えたことを証明する。

ゲームの世界観は歴史的事実と想像力を加えた一種のファクション（Faction）である。ゲームの中では、過去20世紀に使用された建物のフォームと服装だけでなく、水遊びをする子供とカーニバルを楽しむ人々の姿など、当時の西洋人たちの生活をそのまま再現した。

バイオショック：インフィニットをプレイする原動力に世界観とストーリーの面白さも欠かせないが、決定的にヒロインのエリザベスを挙げることができる。エリザベスの魅力は、一般的に保護し,救出すべきである知れたヒロインではないという点である。

「バイオショック：インフィニット」は、これまでなかった人間味のあふれるヒロインエリザベスを誕生させた名作である。しかし、「バイオショック1」がゲーマーに抱かせた奇抜さと衝撃に比べれば 、その程度が弱いという感じを消すことができない。ここで前作と違って 、恐怖を排除した外伝という点では、前作以上に期待したファンの立場としては、物足りなさが大きいかもしれない。それでもゲーム自体は十分に楽しいという点で僕はこのゲームを名作として評価する。

ЭТО ШЕДЕЕЕВРРР!

Oynadığım 15 saat boyunca bir kere bile bir problemle karşılaşmadım. Sadece ufak bir bug oldu. "Optional Mission" yaptığım halde yapmadım diye Quest Log'da görünmüştü, onun da oyuna hiçbir etkisi yok zaten. Herneyse bu oyun Bioshock 1 ve 2 ile alakalı ama hikaye bazında değil. Hikayeler kesişmiyor ama mantığı bir noktada kesişiyor. Grafikleri hala muazzam görünüyor. 20 sene geçse de öyle görünecek bence çünkü kendine has bir tarzı var. Loot yapmak, gizli Vox Cipher'ları bulmak, Lockpickleri toplayıp kilitli odaları ve kasaları açmak, "Vigor" denen her biri ayrı özellikte sihir güçlerini kullanmak, silahları ve vigorları geliştirmek ve tüm bunları yaparken de hikayeyi merak ederek oynamak. Bir FPS oyunundan ne beklenebilirse hepsini karşılamış bence Bioshock Infinite. Hikayesi ise tam anlamıyla MU-AZ-ZAM. Oyunu bitirince "Wow!" Türkçemizle "Vay Anasını!" diyorsunuz ve garip hislerle başbaşa kalıp Credits'i izlerken kendinizi buluyorsunuz. Sonrasında Credits'i tam olarak izlerseniz bitiminde sizi düşündürecek ufak bir sahneye şahit oluyorsunuz. Ben oyunu tüm toplanabilirlerle bitirdim ama henüz DLC'lerini oynamadım. Onları da bitirince incelemeye ayrıca ekleme yapacağım. Duyduğuma göre DLC'leri serinin ilk oyunlarıyla bağlantılıymış. Ve benden size bir tavsiye; eğer ki bu, oyun için okuduğunuz ilk inceleme ise diğer incelemeleri okumadan oynayın, çünkü bir çok kendini bilmez arkadaş oyun hakkında spoiler vermiş, hiç hoş değil. "İyi ki incelemelere bakmamışım." dedirtti yani bana.

Güncelleme: DLC'leri de an itibariyle bitirmiş bulunuyorum. Çok üzgünüm çünkü Irrational Games dağıldı biliyorsunuz ki. Bir daha oyun camiası bu denli kaliteli bir oyun göremez diye çok üzgünüm. Sadece Bioshock Infinite oynayanlar bile hikaye hakkında çok fazla şey öğrenebilir DLC'lerde ama seriyi tamamen bitirmiş oyuncular daha çok etkilenecektir. Hikayeye tam manasıyla noktayı koymak için DLC'leri de bitirmelisiniz. Yukarıda çok övemedim, kelimeler yetmiyor ama oyun hikayesiyle, görselliğiyle, müzikleriyle ve de anlatım tarzıyla tam bir sanat eseri. Kendine oyuncu diyenlerin kesinlikle oyun anılarında yer alması gereken bir oyun. Yine muazzam bir film izlemiş ve "Allah'ım ben ne izledim böyle" der gibi kaldım Credits'in başında. Credits bitince yine ufak bir sahne giriyor bu sefer serinin başlangıcına bir gönderme var. Böyle kaliteli oyunların çoğalması dileğiyle incelememi burada sonlandırıyorum.

Excellent jeu, soutenu par une histoire porteuse et un univers graphique réussi. 
Les graphismes ne sont pas au goût du jour, mais sont particulièrement réussis et cependant toujours argréables aujourd'hui. Quelques difficultés dans le déplacement du joueur, le mode course est tel qu'il se faisait souvent il y a qq années : le moindre heurt sur la moindre pierre ou élément de décor et c'est l'arrêt.

Une très belle réussite, à avoir absolument dans sa bibliothèque de jeu.

The gameplay is great and the story is amazing.
